name: Cannibal's House
description:
You are trying to escape the cannibal's house. Find hidden objects, solve puzzles, run, and hide before he catches you. Don't become a diner.

Playtime: Around 30 - 40 minutes.

Control:

Move: ADWS or Arrows

Run: Shift + Move

Interact: E

Jump: Space

Crouch: C

Flash Light: F

Pause: P

Notes:

1. Crouch, run under the bed or sofa or stay inside the closet to hide.

2. Be careful using the flashlight, it makes the cannibal find you easier (You don't have the flashlight at the beginning, you have to search for it).

3. Don't forget the key after using it. 

4. If you own an older version of the Cannibal game, please upgrade to this version ( bugs fixed, new features added). Thank you for your support.

Good luck!

P/S: Feedback/Bug report is appreciated!
